document.full_text: hundreds of saudi shi'ites protested in the oil-producing east for a second day on friday, calling for the release of prisoners held without trial and political and religious rights, activists said.
document.title: saudi shi'ites rally for second day to call for rights
lines_and_colors: hundreds of saudi shi'ites protested in the oil-producing east for a second day on friday, calling for the release of prisoners held without trial and political and religious rights, activists said.
